alert.note: Alert for Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Ogle and eastern Lee Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lost Nation to near Sublette. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Paw Paw around 515 PM CDT. Rochelle around 530 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include West Brooklyn, Compton and Steward. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 78 and 92. I-88 between mile markers 63 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
